channel.title: No item.cfg or item4.java files?
channel.description: I've downloaded a new source (The Lost Universe V1.0) and I noticed that there's no item.cfg or item4.java files. Is there anyway to change stats without item.cfg, and make items equip in the right slot without item4.java? Or do you just need item.java for that?

item.title: No item.cfg or item4.java files?
item.dc:creator: @Level_99_Noob_Slayin Level 99 Noob Slaying
item.description:
@Level_99_Noob_Slayin wrote:

There is item.cfg… No need to download a different source. Just go to Folder Options and go to View and then find the thing about hidden files/folders and then click “show hidden files/folders.” Now you can see ALL the files.

Read full topic

item.title: No item.cfg or item4.java files?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It may have a configuration folder, did you check?

Yes you could use another source’s item configuration file, but it may mess up a few things.

Read full topic

item.title: No item.cfg or item4.java files?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

Alright, so would it be possible to take an item.cfg file from a different source and use it?

Read full topic

item.title: No item.cfg or item4.java files?
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

Item.cfg is the only way

Read full topic
